website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech G935 is an attractive, comfortable wireless gaming headset that doesn't bring enough audio power or clarity to justify its price.
cons: Underwhelming treble and only modest bass

customer_reviews.title: A direct upgrade to the G933
customer_reviews.text: It's essentially an upgrade to the G930 but with enhanced sound drivers. Amongst the best sounding headsets currently on the market. Battery life isn't great but the sound quality is, you can improve by turning off the lighting on the device. The biggest issue I have is that overall the volume is too low, you can hear too much external noise while using. Recommended, but the volume is too low gor general gaming. This is due to an EU directive rather than the manufacturer but it does mean that you can hear too much external noise.
customer_reviews.author: Sledgehamster

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headset
customer_reviews.text: The headset is great, sometimes when I'm talking to my friends I like being able to get out of my seat and still be able to talk to them instead of having to take my headset off and put it back on. The battery lasts really long. The microphone is really good in my opinion. The headset does have some RGB, and if you want to reduce battery usage of your headset I suggest you turn the RGB off. There are also some buttons that you can use as macro keys, and there's a volume control on the back of the headset. Overall, a well-designed headset by Logitech.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Not true xbox one compatible
customer_reviews.text: Was so impressed with these, but then we found out that they dont work wireless with xbox one, very disappointing they should not be allowed to say xbox compatible if the main feature ‘wireless’ doesnt work. Not sure what to do with them now as essentially they work through the 3.5 jack cable, but still require charging like true wireless sets, guess i will approach amazon for the possibility of a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Richards

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming Headset in This Price Range
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is unreal and the 7.1 is amazing, i can hear directions with pinpoint accuracy when im playing R6S. The keybindings for the buttons on Ghub is great and the mic quality is pretty good too never had complaints, its nice i can just lift the mic up to mute it instead of pressing a button. The wireless also doesn't affect the latency so no problems there. I recommend you turn the RGB off to save the battery as its pretty pointless on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best gaming headset you can get.
customer_reviews.text: I’m personally a studio monitor kind of guy and prefer open back headphones, but decided to get these, because I needed something closed back and wireless. They are probably the best sounding headset I heard in a while. I tried steelseries artics pro, hyper x, Razer, Astro etc. These definitely compete with the artics pro, but in my opinion they sound just a tad better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you own an xbox
customer_reviews.text: If I had the option this product would get no stars from me . When reading the discription it says they are compatable with x box which is total b s . They can only be used with xbox with a cable so the fact that you bought wireless headphones for your kid for Christmas that cost almost 80 quid, only to find out on Christmas morning that they ain't wireless at all and you could have bought a cheaper set really wound me up . Now I'm stuck with them as santa brought them .
customer_reviews.author: mark davidson

customer_reviews.title: Bloody amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed for the price, I have used Logitech headsets in the past and been very disappointed in one way or another , however these are truly something else, their audio is comparable to the wired razer Kraken and the hyper X cloud alphas yet these have 7.1 surround and wireless, I fully recommend these for gamers of all types
customer_reviews.author: Shell N' Jord

customer_reviews.title: Wireless on PC only - caution when buying for consoles.
customer_reviews.text: I was seriously disappointed when getting the headset. This is NOT a wireless headset for console gaming, the blue tooth connectivity is only for PC gaming. All other devices require you to connect with the 3.5mm cable. On Xbox, there is still additional hardware required to use the microphone. So, overall, extremely disappointed how this device is sold as this mislead me to believing this was a wireless product. Nowhere on the packaging or in the descriptions of the product does it mention that console gaming requires a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, solid well made product. The lighting is not to my taste, though it’s easy to turn off through the Logitech software you can download from their website. Added bonus that turning the lights off extends battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headset...for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Used to adore this headset, however it broke randomly one morning after 8 months of use. Installed the drivers on a fresh windows install after upgrading my rig and it just stopped working. Every 10 minutes I'm having to restart my audio drivers- rendering it pointless for gaming or streaming. It would also emit a loud screeching noise whenever the driver crashed and caused damage to my ears. Do NOT recommend if you have sensitive ears or ASD like me. As I stream full time I need a reliable headset. Submitted a ticket but it seems a lot of people are having the same issue which Logitech doesn't seem to be addressing.
customer_reviews.author: Seth W

customer_reviews.title: G933 vs G935
customer_reviews.text: Overall this sounds better. G933 are common to have problem with power button which causes issues with sound quality. So upgraded to these. No more dolby sound which i miss but you have dts 2.0 so ok 933 insider side had more space than these and ear padding was more comfy as well
customer_reviews.author: Shahzada

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is bargain basement
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these after the microphone became so poor as to be unusable. Bottom line, Logitech have used some incredibly cheap components along with unshielded wiring which scrapes along a PCB as you move the microphone up and down. It's basically luck of the draw as to whether or not this will cause problems but in troubleshooting it seemed to be a common issue. It could all be avoided for about 10¢ of better wire. Shame because they sound fantastic and they're really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Best headset for gaming - slightly weak battery
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the best set of headphones I have ever owned! I havent had a single problem with them, the only thing that bothers me a little is the battery only lasts 18hours of use - which is great but I tend to forget to charge them :/ - but other than that! Amazing :D
customer_reviews.author: Curtis-Ray Watson

customer_reviews.title: Rips my hair out
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound amazing and are super comfortable.....until i take them off and they rip my hair out. The leather/fabric bit on the part that rests on my head came a bit loose and it rips my hair out every time i take off the headphones. Super annoying and quite sore too. UPDATE : the band on the headphones is actually falling off and my hair was getting stuck to the glue underneath. I’ve barely had them one month and they’re already falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is the FIFTH one in 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Like Logitech but for hard gamers the life expectancy is very bad for the cost
customer_reviews.author: STAR

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound , great quality ! It is geared more towards the pc (I use ps4) especially if you want to muck around with the settings .Really pleased with them would definitely recommend ! They also seem loud enough for me and at points had to turn them down when things get busy with bullets flying and explosions going off!
customer_reviews.author: T. Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: seemed ok but son couldn't get to connect to xbox correctly or to get the microphone to work. Returned for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H

customer_reviews.title: It worked OK for a while
customer_reviews.text: The headset is much more bulky in real than I expected. The sound quality is just OK. The mic does good. Unfortunately it is sensitive for loosing signal. There are random disconnections (or just the mic is disconnecting and the sound is still working). Battery is loosing capacity very quickly. I cant recommend it for gaming because of low stability. I am looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much to Logitec for creating a great pair of 🎧, I purchased these as my current pair were well worn out & splitting. Build quality is great, sounds awesome, application to use them is good too. Especially for an old time gamer like me 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Ripper

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Just got them before christmas for only 67 quid. Use them only for my PC, sound quality is freaking amazing ! Battery life is good to and if after some time it will stop hold the charge it is east replaceable . Really good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT compatible with Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Clearly I did some poor research. I bought these after a recommendation from a friend who uses them on PS4, turns out the wireless capability through a USB dongle is not compatible with Xbox One. I have tried them with the cables (usb to xbox and sound jack to controller) and the sound is actually pretty good. I think I would recommend these to someone without an xbox one.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rowe

customer_reviews.title: It's alrite
customer_reviews.text: Better than my old G633 headset with sound quality and ease of use although I'm pretty appalled at the noise cancellation, With the headset on and playing games, I can still hear everything going on in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Senshan

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Headset
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Very comfortable and still cool after many hours of constant usage - 7.1 sounds is working - Amazing mic Cons: - It's not pretty - Bulky - Software from LG is not showing accurate battery status - a bit of bass would be great
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Expensive at full price
customer_reviews.text: At discount price was a great buy but at full price it is expensive. Battery life us ok not brilliant love the mute by pushing mic up. Easy to install and customize through software.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whiteaway

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset but can’t turn the volume up for game sound knob just keeps turning so maybe a fault with mine other than that very good you will need the Xbox controller adapter to connect cable to.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect audio, comfortable, amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought they were uncomfortable, but after ajusting the head band you don't even feel like you have them on. Buttons on the side are great I have one mapped to open discord(takes a bit of getting used to where they are) but really work. Not sure what else you could use them for. Wireless range is amazing, I my setup in the loft and when I go to make a drink 2 floors down then stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: James Tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming headset. Quite heavy and tight across my head but I didnt really notice after I started gaming. Good speakers and mic. Decent battery life. Good software.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: My partner is a big gamer and loves these best he’s ever had! There smart, comfortable, sturdy, volume is fantastic, all over impressed thank you! Great delivery to
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Not worth to buy :(
customer_reviews.text: Really bad. I think it only worth 50 pounds. Uncomfortable, no noise cancellation, too big And it has a great smell of formaldehyde !! I should say all Logitech products are trash.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent very good sound very pleased what more can you say sound quality is very good noise cancellation good everything about them excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Grandad

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: features are all limited to use of the USB cable included, which was completely non functional, amazon lists Logitech as offering replacements, but their customer service didn't help in the slightest. My own USB cables allowed it to work, but were not long enough to use as a proper solution. So ultimately had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not fully compatible with PS4
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with Play Station - even though it says fully compatible, the most important features don’t work on PS4, even when connected via the USB dongle: • Surround Sound 7.1 doesn’t work • Buttons cannot be programmed • Not all buttons work • Volume is too low Without any of these, the remaining functionality and sound quality is the same as any cheap stereo headphones.
customer_reviews.author: nas

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Would recommend They have great sound and light to wear. They light up different colours which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and really crisp microphone
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this headset is amazing and the microphone is really crispy, if you get the software to go with it then you can adjust the bass/treble, RGB lighting and overall sound to your hearts content, the bass on these headphones is REALLY nice and I recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Dillon Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily use (or Gaming)
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if you’re buying this, it’s very good, it can last up to a whole day of using it, and before sleeping or when taking a break an hour - 2 hours charge is enough at another 80-85% Very Good in sound and for gaming it’s very good if you need your snacks etc. across the room it’s wireless ability is good Noise Cancelation is Okay, you can still hear sounds normal but more dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashib Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Wifi key is defective.....
customer_reviews.text: The gaming heads worked for 2 hours. The wifi key is defective. Quality to review or defect on this gaming head only? I think to ask for an exchange or a refund. However Amazon customer service is pleasant and tried to find a solution with Logitech
customer_reviews.author: Cristof.V

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these headphones for few months now. Sound is really good and some small sounds from the game which you din't usualy hear very good are so clear with these headphones. I use Logitech peripherals for a while and i am really happy about them though many people complain about them in many reviews. I would definitely recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Radu Costin Toma

customer_reviews.title: 7.1 surround wireless Headset .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice of gaming Headset 7.1 surround, comfortable fit, and terrific Clarity . Not the cheapest but definitely well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon McPhail

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: bought because it can change the battery without taking them apart. bit annoying the magnetic sides but overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Impressed that much bought matching items
customer_reviews.text: Very well made not disappointed Infact this product made me go out to buy matching keyboard and mouse plus Matt
customer_reviews.author: goldensurfer 1

customer_reviews.title: does not work with switch or xbox
customer_reviews.text: purchased for xbox one x and Nintendo switch , needs a cable for both and also didn't work with either.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Surrey

customer_reviews.title: Item Returned
customer_reviews.text: They were too uncomfortable for long periods of time and the battery didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Terrible software requirement.
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are great the software is trash. There is a process called LGhub_agent that will randomly use 100% of your CPU, reports online go back over a year and Logitech can’t be bothered to fix it. I will avoid all Logitech products from now on because you have to install their software and as I said it’s TRASH!
customer_reviews.author: RenOfHeathens

customer_reviews.title: Became one of my favourites for music listening
customer_reviews.text: Te sound quality is very good for listening music on it as well. worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: tudor

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: + Good sound + Good material quality + Comfortable to wear to for longer periods of time + Easy to use it - Hard to find the battery level, the only way to find it is through Logitech G Hub software
customer_reviews.author: Victor D.

customer_reviews.title: I JUST LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Its just amazing, the best headset ever Im in love with the product after you download the app you can personalize everything even the led colours it came early tham I expected Amazin product
customer_reviews.author: Marcielly Christine Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: They are very good!!! The sound is amazing especially when you activate the surround sound, i feel it sounds slightly tinny with it. The mic isn’t top of the range but it is better than most wireless headphones out there. I would definitely recommend and for the price i don’t think it can be beaten.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 xbox one just 4 PC good
customer_reviews.text: No stay away coz not compatible for xbox one only for PC good
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: Review!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset, worth the price tag and a fantastic brand!
customer_reviews.author: kuyenmotdivad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement cement for logi's
customer_reviews.text: Got used to them very quickly. Quality well above average
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: they are good
customer_reviews.text: they have done what i wanted, the LED's are kind of useless, but the sound is great, they are comfy and very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: crazyking321

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, awesome sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Upgraded from an older model, and the difference is really apparent. Great sound quality, excellent directional sound too - clear microphone (as per other people's feedback!) - fully recommended :)
customer_reviews.author: Marc C

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gamnh
customer_reviews.text: Really like these I had the G633 not much difference.
customer_reviews.author: A. Staz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing headset
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing headset!! For the money it's worth it and the battery lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound very impressive had a few but these are by far the best
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer clark

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: These were poor they say suitable for Xbox one... they are not.they don’t work wirelessly. Even with a cable they don’t work properly. Returned immediately for refund.
customer_reviews.author: richard ian osborne

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant all rounded products.
customer_reviews.text: Best headsets I have ever baught 7.1 surround sound is good. Footsteps clear in fps games, voice chat clear dose not effect gameplay. Flip up mute mic work perfectly if someone come in your room so nobody hears your conversation, they a brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall they are one of the best headphones for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, since these are specifically designed for gaming some of the aspects like noise cancellation, microphone, and sound dynamics are not perfect. However, every aspect is good enough to give this headset 5 stars when everything is considered.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Carabott

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset - but it is heavy
customer_reviews.text: Simple to set-up, great sound. I do find that just after 2 hours, my head can get a little sore after wearing the headset, but that might just be me,
customer_reviews.author: AAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Good headset
customer_reviews.text: The headset is of good quality and i am satisfied with it,the flaw is in that it is wireless and the sound is lacking compared to when i plug in the 3.5mm jack but as i said a good headset,nice,confortable and RGB so that is a plus in my book
customer_reviews.author: mangymutt

customer_reviews.title: disconnectes very often
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this product to begin with but after a few months its completely useless discontinues so often that it takes away from any fun that could be had with this i highly recommended looking some where else if you want a headset that actually works
customer_reviews.author: Darren Meechan

customer_reviews.title: Works at LAN Events!
customer_reviews.text: The only headset that I have used that works at LANs when it’s used wirelessly. That is to say I’m sure if a lot more of these were used there would then be too much interference. But from experience I haven’t had that issue yet
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Right ear no audio
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, looks good.... BUT (and its big BUT) no audio in the right earphone... Makes the surround sound thing a bit VERY redundant.
customer_reviews.author: Liv. E

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These are really great headphone and very comfortable for long gamings sessions. The mic works works great but I didn't need to play with the levels in discord to avoid it picking up the TV in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: Mitesh P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Price for nice quality :)
customer_reviews.text: Well comparing to some soundblaster they not keep tight at your head are not heavy and microphone is not annoying catching any sound u make or sometimes glitch like other even expensive one models do :)

customer_reviews.title: micro usb port stopped working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: not sure why i keep buying logitech gear. the micro usb plug socket is so badly made that my headset is not only functioning with the 3.5mm jack. now i cant use my headset to voice chat. thanks logitech for your great products.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: My review is based on one short use of 30 min. It was a present for a friend. Very good headphones and great sound

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless on Xbox one
customer_reviews.text: The description I s misleading. These are very good quality but they are NOT WIRELESS ON THE XBOX ONE. Only wireless on PC and PS4. Sent back for a refund

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: No Wireless works for anything. G-hub software is a waste of time and won't load or find the headphones. Support is none existent. Waste of money. Buy something for £20. Will be just as good.

customer_reviews.text: The glue for the headband cushion failed in 2 weeks.

customer_reviews.text: nice sound not the loudest and mic broken on delivery have to send back will not buy again and I have a g910 keyboard and a g502 mouse I will be replacing with razor instead.

customer_reviews.text: Was not compatible for Xbox one and one earpiece didn't work. Had a very disappointed son on Xmas morning ☹️☹️ returned & refunded

customer_reviews.text: Good headphones sadly the sound kept cutting out ingame and I had to relog into game to get sound back. I am sure this is a one off fault and has been dealt with by returning product.

customer_reviews.title: Colour changing and noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Gaming. The mic is not great. But phones are brilliant

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic price as they were new unused but at a fraction of the cost of new.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent be handy if it told you volume toggle didn't work with 3.5mm but there work great, just under a year and the slot for the cable doesn't work anymore falls out every 2 seconds disappointed to not get 1 years use out of em

product_meta.title: Logitech G935 Wireless Gaming RGB Headset, 7.1 Surround Sound, DTS Headphone:X 2.0, 50 mm Pro-G Drivers, 2.4 GHz Wireless , Flip-to-Mute Mic, PC/Mac/Xbox One/PS4/Nintendo Switch - Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:WirelessG935 is the ultimate wireless gaming headset, enhanced with the most advanced Logitech audio technology. Hear more detail with large 50 mm Pro-G drivers, made of woven hybrid mesh designed to reduce distortion. LIGHTSYNC RGB lighting is fully customisable and reacts to in-game action on supported games. For maximum immersion, DTS Headphone:X 2.0 surround sound creates precise in-game positional awareness. Hear enemies sneaking up behind you, sense air attacks or special-ability cues, and enjoy the full cinematic experience of your favourite games. Additional gaming features include a large 6 mm flip-to-mute mic and programmable G-Keys on the headset.
feature_bullets: Nothing to hold you back - game wirelessly for up to 12 hours with complete freedom in movement thanks to powerful 2.4 GHz wireless
50 mm Pro-G drivers - get expansive sound; 50 mm Pro-G audio drivers are made from proprietary woven hybrid mesh
Immersive DTS Headphone: Hear enemies sneaking around you, special ability cues and immersive environments with positional clarity; it can be the difference between victory and defeat
Loud and clear 6 mm mic+ - get clear and precise voice comms with a large 6 mm boom mic; mic+ flips up to mute with a red mute light indicator
Also mix in an additional audio source with the included 3.5 mm cable; battery life measured without lighting at 50 percent volume
They deliver an ideal sonic experience, with greater depth and detail, and minimal distortion

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
